    Build an Atom A11y View: Visual and Described content side by side

    The accessible version of Build an Atom is embedded in the iframe. As you interact with the visual sim in the iframe with either a keyboard or mouse, the descriptions for the sim automatically update on the right in a copy of the sim's structured Parallel Document Object Model, or PDOM.
